Containers.Name: fhem
Containers.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Description[/span][/u][/b][br] FHEM ist ein Computerprogramm, mit dem man Ger√§te in einem Haus automatisch steuern kann (Hausautomation). [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where FHEM will store it's configuration file and modules, database and logs.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Documentation[/span][/u][/b][br] https://github.com/fhem/fhem-docker [br][br]
Containers.Overview: This is a node.js server which works as a websocket gateway to a fhem (home automation) server. Clients can use socket.io in Javascript and Java to establish a websocket connection to fhem. It is possible to subscribe for updates of fhem resource stati like on/off or temperature. The websocket connection will deliver this values just in time. Furthermore fhem commands could be send other this connection.
